answers.answer: I was so desperate too... I just had my bby#3  4days ago I was 40 weeks nd 1 day over due u just never know if u could have her /him sooner.... I had my induce apt schedule 2... Just be positive walk a lot.......good luck..
Oh congratulations hopefully i will have baby in the nxt couple days thanks for sharing

It might happen on its own. I'm sure my midwife said with 3nd babies and any after that they normally stay free and just engage when your in labour that's what happen with my 3rd and I was 3 cm when I when in I was like own 7 more to go and she laughed and said now you only have to get to 5 with 3nd baby.
Saying that within an hour my water broke and a few minutes after I felt that burning pain in between my leg and my son head was out. Without a midwife in the room just me and my partner

I don't know, but I have four friends who went into labor after having a pedicure!   Treat yourseld to a pedicure if you can..... pineapple and eggplant are wives' tales perhaps bit no harm done in eating the deliciousness! !!!  Good luck!  :)
Prenatal massage, pressure points, acupuncture, the milk and OJ thing, castor oil, spicy food, sex, nipple stimulation, are all supposed to work. Try everything! Lol
Thanks ladies =) im still pregnant lol 40+2 weeks just waiting hoping he/she will come soon. Ive tried lots but nothing had worked im just gonna wait til baby is ready.

question: So i had a midwife appoint. Today and she says baby is comfortable and is not coming out anytime soon =/ last week at 39 weeks baby was 3/5 engaged now he/she has decided to go the opposite way and is now 5/5 errhh so over it so looks like im gonna probably be induced in the nxt 2wks (which i wanted to avoid!!!) Nxt week im scheduled to have monitoring done on baby and a induction date made. This is the longest ive been pregnant and feeling as though baby will never come! (My first was induced at 39wks due to diabetes my second came on her own at 38 weeks) i just want it over now and am very uncomfortable and frustrated. Sorry i just felt like having a rant as it feels as though baby is going in the wrong direction!!! Has anyone else been in my position? And did u make it to the induction date or did u go into labour before hand? Thanks ladies
title: 40 weeks today and baby is misbehaving =/ rant!
